### Welcome

This website is for Data Science Final Project, where we analyze the dataset based on the lists of each accidental death associated with drug overdose in Connecticut from 2012 to 2018.

</br>

### Motivations

Illicit drug use in the United States has been increasing and the number of related death is also growing. Therefore, studying the relationship between drug use and related death is important to discourage drug use and prevent death. In this project, we are going to analyze the data in drug use and related death in  Connecticut from 2012 to 2018 and intend to discover some critical factors in drug use that will arise high chance to be dead.

</br>

### Data

**data source**: [Accidental Drug Related Deaths 2012-2018](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/accidental-drug-related-deaths-january-2012-sept-2015)
